name: Zoorbar 2.1.1
summary: Zoorbar 2.1.1, software to manage and digitize zoological collections.
short_description: Zoorbar 2.1.1 is the updated version of a software application based on MS-Access, designed to manage and digitize zoological collections. Find credits and further information about Zoorbar 2.1 on its website: http://www.gbif.es/zoorbar/zoorbar.php.
